Hero.aboutMe3: I am a software developer who is passionate about working with the latest technologies and tools to create applications that meet users' needs. I love to interact with users and integrate their feedback into my apps, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable experience. I am dedicated to solving problems and addressing issues in any situation, and I am always eager to learn and expand my knowledge.As a self-taught professional in the software development field, I thrive on the joy of continuous learning. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Industrial Engineering, which has provided me with valuable experience in management and planning, enhancing my ability to work efficiently. I am ready for any challenge and committed to delivering high-quality solutions.
Hero.aboutMe4: I am dedicated to solving problems and addressing issues in any situation, and I am always eager to learn and expand my knowledge.As a self-taught professional in the software development field, I thrive on the joy of continuous learning. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Industrial Engineering, which has provided me with valuable experience in management and planning, enhancing my ability to work efficiently. I am ready for any challenge and committed to delivering high-quality solutions.

Skills.frontEndDesc: I began my journey in the front-end field and have developed strong skills in React and Next.js. I am also proficient in using Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS for styling. Additionally, I am an expert with state management tools and have a good understanding of TypeScript.
Skills.backEndDesc: As my front-end coding skills improved, I began learning about APIs and databases. I have good knowledge of SQL Server, including stored procedures, tables, and relationships. For my APIs, I use either Next.js or Express, and I have experience with MongoDB, although I prefer SQL.
Skills.otherDesc: Additionally, I am familiar with Docker and GraphQL, and I use Figma for design. I also have experience with Git and GitHub for version control.

projects.subTitle: My projects are designed to address various user needs, catering to both personal and corporate requirements. Some projects are personal endeavors, while others involve collaborations with companies. For further details about each project and to learn more, please visit the Projects page. Additionally, you can reach out to me via email for any inquiries or collaboration opportunities. Thank you for your interest!

contactMe.subTitle: You can reach me via email with the below form. Please feel free to  send me a message, and I'll get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for reaching out!
contactMe.name: Name

footer.readySub: Just so you know, I'm ready to tackle any challenge that comes my way. Bring it on!
